edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol
Interface SigmaProverComputation

All Known Implementing Classes:
SigmaANDProverComputation, SigmaCramerShoupEncryptedValueProverComputation, SigmaDHExtendedProverComputation, SigmaDHProverComputation, SigmaDJEncryptedValueProverComputation, SigmaDJEncryptedZeroProverComputation, SigmaDJProductProverComputation, SigmaDlogProverComputation, SigmaElGamalCmtKnowledgeProverComputation, SigmaElGamalCommittedValueProverComputation, SigmaElGamalEncryptedValueProverComputation, SigmaElGamalPrivateKeyProverComputation, SigmaORMultipleProverComputation, SigmaORTwoProverComputation, SigmaPedersenCmtKnowledgeProverComputation, SigmaPedersenCommittedValueProverComputation
public interface SigmaProverComputation

This interface manages the mathematical calculations of the prover side in the sigma protocol.

It samples random values and computes the messages.

Author:
Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
